summary:
$MEGA - Make Ethereum Great Again - $MEGA (Make Ethereum Great Again) is a cryptocurrency created to reignite the spirit of Ethereum. As blockchain technology evolves, we believe Ethereum will once again lead the decentralized revolution. $MEGA is committed to reaffirming Ethereum’s status as the world’s leading smart contract platform and fostering greater community participation. Whether you’re a developer, investor, or everyday user, $MEGA is here to witness Ethereum’s resurgence with you.

  -
